name: Tower Topple
description:
Controls:

X - Jump

Z - Shoot

Arrow Keys - Movement

The Dark Wizard Falixor has taken the princess and the Kingdom's funds and taken over the land! It's up to Skullbo, the self-proclaimed greatest dark magician in the land to stop him!

The Final Project for my Game Design Course! This project was made with GBStudio, a really cool tool that helps you make gameboy games. You can check it out here:

https://www.gbstudio.dev/

As much as I would've loved to have made my own music, time was short and good music is hard to make. Thankfully, the folks in the gbstudio community have put together a community resources github containing all kinds of stuff to use when making your projects. All of the music in the game is sourced from here, an extra huge shout out to them! You can check out the github here: https://github.com/DeerTears/GB-Studio-Community-Assets

All of the coding and spritework present within this project was done within a few weeks time 100% solo on my part as per the assignment, and I'm very proud of what I've managed to make here.
